environment.init.sh: Sets up the environment variables needed for the HPCToolkit application, potentially including CUDA_HOME for GPU usage
environment.CUDA_HOME: The directory where the CUDA toolkit is installed, required for GPU utilization within the HPCToolkit profiling

tools.make: Compiles the application (jacobi) and its dependencies
tools.hpcrun: Executes the jacobi application while profiling its execution using HPCToolkit
tools.hpcstruct: Generates a performance profile structure for the application, potentially including GPU information
tools.hpcprof: Analyzes the profiling data to produce a performance report
